DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize compare concentration-time profile multiple dose pharmacokinetics 5 minute intravenous ( IV ) bolus ertapenem 1 gram daily versus standard 30 minute infusion healthy volunteer . Safety tolerability pharmacodynamic target attainment use Monte Carlo simulation also assess compare .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Ertapenem Intravenous ( IV ) Bolus Versus Standard Infusion
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult ( 18 year age old ) Ertapenem betalactam allergy Pregnant breast feeding female Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great equal 30 Abnormal lab value baseline Hypertension Significant medical abnormality Regular alcohol consumption Significant nicotine use
